      • addKurs

        public boolean addKurs(int kursstufe,
                       Date datum,
                       String wochentag,
                       String uhrzeit)
        Adds a new column to the Kurs table .
        Parameters:
        kursstufe - level of the dancing lessons see [.]
        datum - java.sql.Date("yyyy-MM-dd")
        wochentag - String for the Day
        uhrzeit - the time the lesson takes place
        Returns:
        Returns true if no exception is thrown otherwise returns false

        pnumber - The users Phone Number

        public int getGender(int id)
        Recieves the ID and reads out the Gender according to the id.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the User
        Returns:
        Returns the Gender of the User as int three Values are possible : 1 for female, 0 for male and -1 in case of an Error
